channel.title: Tv on Aleph-Zero-Heros

item.title: Buffy
item.description: Buffy is brilliant 6 season on TV (plus one slightly off movie) 5 seasons of Angel 3 seasons on comics, plus others, plus Angle, Spike, … reboot novels Joss Whedon too strong female leads – that was kind of the point But this is just a shot-out to book that, in some ways inspired this blog Multi-scale, self-similarity Joss master of the + monster of the week + the season long plot – the “big bad” + the hints and easter eggs hinting at a longer plot, almost as long as the series
